name: Aka Time VR
description:
Gameplay

  • Play as Spiderman：Use spider silk to pull the enemy over, then beat him to death with a fist
  • Play as Captain America：Throw the shield at the enemy to kill the enemy
  • Grab the bullet with your hand：Like in the movies, grab the bullet with your hand and throw it at the enemy to kill the enemy
  • A lot of weapons：Every level has brand new weapons, shield is just one of them, every experience is different
  • Control time：You do not move, the enemy does not move; you move, the enemy moves

Other features

  • Easy to operate：The whole process uses only the trigger button
  • Strategy：Each level has a special function of the boss, requires a strategy to pass
  • The first 3 levels are free：The Demo version contains the first 3 levels, which can be downloaded for free and can be experienced for about 1 hour. You can experience the Demo first. If the Demo is fun, then consider buying the full version. The full version can experience more levels, more weapons, and more bosses.
Every level has brand new weapons, brand new enemies, brand new bosses, so every level is a brand new feeling. This is an independent game, developed for more than 2 years, the development costs by the team members to borrow money to make up. Due to the shortage of funds, the development process has been interrupted many times, very difficult. Hopefully it will be the best action VR game in your mind.If you have any ideas, please let us know, and we'd love to hear your thoughts. Email：akakeji@163.com
